casebody.data:
LASSITER, Respondent, v. HOES, Appellant. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. February 5, 1894.) Action by Richard J. Lassiter against Edith Hyde Hoes.

Argued before SEDGWICK, C. J., and GILDERSLEEVE and DUGRO, JJ.

Calvin D. Van Name, for appellant. William R. Wilder, for respondent..

No opinion. Order affirmed, with $10 costs.
